Oxnard.Point Hueneme Light:
Point Hueneme Lighthouse is a lighthouse on the southeast entrance to the Santa Barbara Channel, in Ventura County, California


== History ==

Point Hueneme Light is a 48-foot-high (15 m), buff-colored 1940 Art Deco style tower on a fog-signal building on the Santa Barbara Channel at the Port of Hueneme.
The original lighthouse was completed in 1874 at Point Hueneme after the construction of a 900-foot-long wharf (270 m) in 1872. When a storm destroyed the wharf in 1938, Oxnard Harbor District was formed and finished construction of the Port of Hueneme in 1940.
